criteria: All Terraform code passes `tflint` and is peer-reviewed. All NestJS services have >80% unit test coverage. CI pipeline is green for all PRs.
success_metrics: Zero regressions. All planned infra modules are testable.

criteria: Identity & Access service is successfully deployed to staging via the CD pipeline. E2E tests for OTP login and RBAC are passing.
success_metrics: Identity service is stable and secure in staging. First service is deployed without manual intervention.

criteria: Checkout Saga passes all security reviews and integration tests for failure paths. Bulk Import feature is tested for injection vulnerabilities. Observability stack is correctly monitoring all services.
bypass_criteria: Critical bugs have documented mitigation plans and are accepted by the PO.
success_metrics: No critical vulnerabilities found. Core business transaction is resilient to failure. System is fully observable.
